tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Treatment for bleeding/ Swolen Gums,Dental Fillings,
review:
I have very good treatment and experience with Dr.Balaji, i strongly recommend this doctor for all teeth problems. Below are my experience, I had done Root Canal treatment for my tooth and filling for rest of 3 teeth and also gum tear in one tooth, Dr.Balaji explained me the procedure and done very good treatment for me, now iam able to chew and bite solid foods at ease. This doctor given rebirth for my teeth which is almost gone case with cavities and gum problems.

My daughter had cross tooth, where the tooth grown inwards and it looks awkward while she smiles, Dr.Balaji sir did a magic brace for her and corrected the tooth. Now her smile with teeth is brand as new. 

Thank you Dr.Balaji sir Good bless you!!!

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: I had admitted in hospital for severe tooth pain which causes pain in my nerves, (Dr. Balaji Srikanth) examined my teeth and did four damaged teeth extraction and did two teeth root canals treatment in just three days sitting. His treatment is good and painless. Further in addition I am going to get treatment for fixing new teeth 8 nos (Dental Implants) in coming weeks. I wish him to get all success in his professional life by serving people to the society.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
* ********* ******* **** ******** ********* *** experience in the profession.  I know him for the past 20 yrs.Very intelligent in diagnosis and frank in explaining the issues confronted by the patients.Charges are reasonable. Computerisation 
 of patients' history is necessary to monitor the dental health of every patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was really a great feeling to be in hospital for my dental issue 
Hospitality and approach was  great and transperant 
My wishes & blessings for Dr Balaji Srikanth and his team members for there support during my visit
My advance wishes  for Dr to expand  his clinic to a Dental hospital 
God bless u Sir

First of all nothing should be improved in your clinic sir. Your friendliness is too good little bit should be improved.  Your explanation is excellent sir. I liked your explanation and your communication  sir. It was so sweet and clear. Thank you so much doctor for your service.

I felt everyone and everything is in a hurry here. I went to get treatment for tooth pain, root canal was done,  although I don't have any pain now but  the crown on top of teeth is mis placed slightly. When I touch the bottom of the teeth with tounge I can feel the edge of the crown coming out,. It is not yet    covered by flesh as told by doctor when crown was fixed.
I need some explanation about my treatment . After treatment how to maintain my teeth and what are the vitamins or medicine will take doctor should say.
I came from malaysia to this clinic. My experience with the doctor Balaji is excellent and  services provided is satisfying
Doctor has to maintain coolness without showing his anxiety over personal matters.otherwise doctor is very friendly approach.
The Doctor had analysed my dental problems and suggested the **** treatment for a permanent solution..
